definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: 1Sa 14:2 district (?) near Gibeah (home of Saul), cf. Buhl:Geogr. 176; LXX Magwn, LXXL Mageddw, (We thinks n. pr. not required, and prop. [[מִגְרָן]] (= SyrVer [[גּׁרֶן]] threshingfloor; so Bu, but word not in Hebrew; Klo, improb., [[מִגְרָשׁ]]).
Is 10:28, place north of Michmash (and Gibeah ), LXX Magedw, perhaps modern ruin Makrun Di:ad loc. Bd:Pal 3. 121 Buhl:l. c.
